content.title: MRA Protocols in Vascular Surgery
content.definition: Magnetic resonance angiography protocols for vascular evaluation without ionizing radiation.

concepts.definition: Gadolinium-enhanced MRA providing high spatial resolution vascular imaging.
Non-contrast MRA technique using flow-related enhancement.

clinical_features.principle: Fresh inflowing blood appears bright due to unsaturated spins

concepts.definition: Non-contrast MRA technique providing both anatomic and flow velocity information.

clinical_features.quantification: Flow velocity and volume measurements possible
clinical_features.venc: Velocity encoding matched to expected flow

concepts.definition: Advanced non-contrast MRA methods for patients with renal insufficiency.

clinical_features.fresh_blood: Cardiac-gated 3D FSE exploiting systolic/diastolic flow differences
clinical_features.qiss: Quiescent Interval Single Shot - fast peripheral MRA
clinical_features.inhance: Inversion-recovery based venous or arterial imaging
